headline: Italian Turkey Meatballs
name: Italian Turkey Meatballs
description: Italian-style turkey meatballs are lean and clean with fresh herbs, Parmesan cheese, and seasoned bread crumbs. Try them on pasta or in a meatball sub!
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons Melt® Organic Buttery Spread, softened

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Grease a broiler pan with buttery spread.

Mix ground turkey, bread crumbs, parsley, Parmesan, tomato sauce, garlic, oregano, rosemary, mustard, cayenne, and salt together in a large bowl until well combined. Form mixture into 30 meatballs; place onto the prepared pan.
Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink inside, about 15 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
